songs.title: See The Truth (Snippet)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Yeah
Ain't wrote to you in a while, feel like I needed to
This world ain't meant for people like me and you
We feel too deep, and we love too strong
Sometimes this worlds too fake and its hard to see the truth
It's hard to explain that you were perfect to me
All the pain and the sacrifice it was worth it to me
'Cause you show me a part of me that I ain't seen
They tell me to give it to time
But I just don't think its working for me
But the scars that we wear show what we're made of
That's when she asked if I'm–
